pagepermissions-desc: This extension provides per-page per-user access control
pagepermissions-usernames-placeholder: Enter the usernames seperated by a comma (,)
pagepermissions-form-desc: You can add the usernames for whom you intend to assign the PagePermissions roles for $1 using the text inputs assigned for each role. If you wish to change these roles and their respective permissions, please contact your wiki administrator.
